title: web develop
content: 1. HTML to define the content of web pages2. CSS to specify the layout of web pages3. JavaScript to program the behavior of web pagesDOM (Document Object Model)A standard defines how to access web pages as documents.This model is supported by almost all the modern browsers.Treat HTML elements as objects.Browser Object Model (BOM)The window object is supported by all browsers.You can directly “communicate” to the browser. I.e.Window popup alert Window.history object
